# CHHapticEngine.FinishedAction.stopEngine

**Case**

Stops the engine after it finishes playing all haptic patterns.

## Declaration

```swift
case stopEngine
```

## Finished Actions

- **CHHapticEngine.FinishedAction.leaveEngineRunning**: Keeps the engine running after it finishes playing all haptic patterns.
